price: 52. (Ingatlah), ketika dia (Ibrahim) berkata kepada ayahnya dan kaumnya, “Patung-patung apakah ini yang kamu tekun menyembahnya?”
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلتَّمَاثِيلُ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنتُمۡ لَهَا عَٰكِفُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mā hādhihi al-tamāthīlu allatī antum lahā ʿākifūna
